DataElement.preferredName: Dental Professional Practice Periodontal Pocket Per Tooth Physical Examination Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the quantity as related to assessment of abnormal deepening of a gingival sulcus in a dental practice per tooth.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Dental Professional Practice Periodontal Pocket Per Tooth Physical Examination
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to assessment in a dental practice of each tooth's abnormal deepening of a gingival sulcus.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to a tooth or teeth, or to odontology.:Health care professional business directed towards treatment and care of patients.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to a tooth or teeth, or to odontology.
Health care professional business directed towards treatment and care of patients.

Property.preferredName: Periodontal Pocket Per Tooth Physical Examination
Property.preferredDefinition: An abnormal deepening of a gingival sulcus.:For each, generally denoting a ratio.:is an organ, the organ parts of which primarily consist of dentine and dental enamel; together with other teeth it constitutes a subdivision of the facial skeleton. Example(s): incisor, molar.:A physical examination is a systemic evaluation of the body and its functions using visual inspection, palpation, percussion, and auscultation, aimed to determine the presence or absence of physical signs of disease or abnormality for individual's health assessment.

Concepts.definition: An abnormal deepening of a gingival sulcus associated with destruction of the supporting periodontal tissue.
For each, generally denoting a ratio.
The hard bonelike structures in the jaws of vertebrates; primarily used for eating.

A systemic evaluation of the body and its functions using visual inspection, palpation, percussion and auscultation. The purpose is to determine the presence or absence of physical signs of disease or abnormality for an individual's health assessment.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The quantity of the specified item.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.

Concepts.definition: Determining the number or amount of something.
